mim.author: ervxipe2
mim.name: Epg_Pgw_RuleSpace
mim.description: Rule space configuration for charging control

enum.name: DefaultType
enum.description: Specify whether tcp-setup deferred-charging is disabled or enabled, by default

enumMember.name: enabled
enumMember.description: Default enabled

enumMember.name: disabled
enumMember.description: Default disabled

enum.name: OngoingReportedPeriod
enum.description: Handling of ongoing reported resolution period applied for time based charging

enumMember.name: allow
enumMember.description: Wait for ongoing reported period to be completed

enumMember.name: not-allow
enumMember.description: Interrupt ongoing reported period

enumMember.name: authorized
enumMember.description: Authorized

enumMember.name: denied-roaming
enumMember.description: Deny access because of roaming class

enumMember.name: denied-user-defined-reason-1
enumMember.description: Deny access due to proprietery operator definition (1)

enumMember.name: denied-user-defined-reason-2
enumMember.description: Deny access due to proprietery operator definition (2)

enumMember.name: denied-user-defined-reason-3
enumMember.description: Deny access due to proprietery operator definition (3)

enumMember.name: denied-user-defined-reason-4
enumMember.description: Deny access due to proprietery operator definition (4)

enumMember.name: denied-user-defined-reason-5
enumMember.description: Deny access due to proprietery operator definition (5)

enumMember.name: denied-blacklisted
enumMember.description: Deny access because rating group is blacklisted

enumMember.name: denied-unknown
enumMember.description: Deny access for unknown reason

enumMember.name: denied-terminal
enumMember.description: Deny access due to terminal limitations

enumMember.name: denied-calendar-time
enumMember.description: Deny access because of time of day

enumMember.name: denied-quality-of-service
enumMember.description: Deny access because of quality of service

enumMember.name: no-reporting
enumMember.description: Do not report active usage

enumMember.name: timestamp
enumMember.description: Report start and stop timestamps for each period of active usage

enumMember.name: timestamp-and-volume
enumMember.description: Report timestamps and used volume for each period of active usage

enum.name: Method
enum.description: Method to use for measurement of active usage

enumMember.name: inactivity
enumMember.description: Use inactivity period but do not included it in usage

enumMember.name: inactivity-included
enumMember.description: Use inactivity period and include it in usage

enumMember.name: duration
enumMember.description: Measure the duration of the session

enumMember.name: active-periods
enumMember.description: Each resolution period with traffic is counted as active usage

enum.name: FinalReport
enum.description: Final reporting for the rating group

enumMember.name: send
enumMember.description: Send a final report for the rating group

enumMember.name: not-send
enumMember.description: Don't send a final report for the rating group

enum.name: TerminationAction
enum.description: Action taken after quota termination of a rating group

enumMember.name: activate-denied-timer
enumMember.description: Apply user-denied-timer after quota termination of the rating-group

enumMember.name: no-activate-denied-timer
enumMember.description: Don't apply user-denied-timer after quota termination of the rating-group

enumMember.name: services-not-allowed
enumMember.description: Blacklist the rating-group after quota termination

derivedDataType.name: SingletonNodeName
derivedDataType.description: Type of single node name, has to be equal to 1

derivedDataType.name: RangedString20
derivedDataType.description: Must contain only letters, numbers, underscores or dashes

derivedDataType.name: BufferLimit
derivedDataType.description: Maximum number of packets to buffer

derivedDataType.name: ServiceSetName
derivedDataType.description: Must be a string beginning with a number or letter and consisting of letters, numbers, dashes and underscores.

derivedDataType.name: HoldingTimePeriod
derivedDataType.description: Period of inactivity after which to report the quota

derivedDataType.name: RuleSpaceName
derivedDataType.description: Must be a string beginning with a number or letter and consisting of letters, numbers, dashes and underscores.

derivedDataType.name: EcimEmpty
derivedDataType.description: The empty built-in type represents a leaf that does not have any value, it conveys information by its presence or absence.

derivedDataType.name: PassThroughLimit
derivedDataType.description: Maximum number of packets to pass through

derivedDataType.name: RangedString21
derivedDataType.description: Must be a service data flow identifier or a range of service data flow identifiers

derivedDataType.name: UserDeniedTime
derivedDataType.description: Time to wait before requesting new quota after a request has been denied

class.name: RuleSpace
class.description: Rule space configuration for charging control
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @serviceSet satisfies (exists(/ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/ServiceSet[@serviceSetId eq $attr]/ServiceIdentification))'><name path='.'/>,serviceSet: Referenced service set must be configured with service-identification</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: ruleSpaceId
attribute.description: Rule space name

attribute.name: serviceSet
attribute.description: The service-set correlating to the rule-space

attribute.name: enableAccessControlRules
attribute.description: Access control rules enabled using access-control-rule id

attribute.name: dropPendingAuthorization
attribute.description: List of service identifiers for which payload will dropped while waiting for authorization

attribute.name: alwaysAllowedAccessControlRule
attribute.description: Always allowed access control rule

class.name: BufferPendingAuthorization
class.description: Settings for buffering packets pending authorization

attribute.name: bufferPendingAuthorizationID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: bufferLimit
attribute.description: Maximum number of packets to buffer

attribute.name: accessControlRule
attribute.description: List of service identifiers for which payload will be buffered while waiting for authorization

class.name: AccessControlRule
class.description: List of service identifiers for which payload will be buffered while waiting for authorization

attribute.name: accessControlRuleId
attribute.description: Access control rule identifier

attribute.name: authorizationCode
attribute.description: Authorization code

class.name: AllowPendingAuthorization
class.description: Settings for passing through packets pending authorization

attribute.name: allowPendingAuthorizationID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: passThroughLimit
attribute.description: Maximum number of packets to pass through

attribute.name: accessControlRule
attribute.description: List of service identifiers for which limited payload will pass while waiting for credit

class.name: RedirectMap
class.description: Map of access control rules to a redirect set
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='@redirectMapId = /ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/ServiceIdentification/HeaderRedirectSet/@headerRedirectSetId or @redirectMapId = /ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/ServiceIdentification/UriRedirectSet/@uriRedirectSetId'><name path='.'/>: Referenced uri-redirect-set or header-redirect-set must be defined</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: redirectMapId
attribute.description: Redirect set name

attribute.name: accessControlRule
attribute.description: Access control rule identifier or set of access control rule identifiers mapped to redirect set

attribute.name: timeBasedChargingID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: measurementID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: resolution
attribute.description: Time measurement resolution for active usage

attribute.name: inactivity
attribute.description: Time measurement inactivity for active usage

attribute.name: reporting
attribute.description: Reporting method for time-based-charging

attribute.name: method
attribute.description: Method to use for measurement of active usage

class.name: RatingGroupCluster
class.description: Common time base definitions for clusters of rating groups

attribute.name: ratingGroupClusterId
attribute.description: Unique ID for the rating-group cluster

attribute.name: ratingGroup
attribute.description: Rating group belonging to this cluster

class.name: QuotaHandling
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @holdingTimePeriod satisfies (not(exists(@holdingTimeInfinity)))'><name path='.'/>,holdingTimePeriod: The following attributes can not be combined: holding-time-period, holding-time-infinity</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @holdingTimeInfinity satisfies (not(exists(@holdingTimePeriod)))'><name path='.'/>,holdingTimeInfinity: The following attributes can not be combined: holding-time-period, holding-time-infinity</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: quotaHandlingID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: holdingTimePeriod
attribute.description: Period of inactivity after which to report the quota

attribute.name: holdingTimeInfinity
attribute.description: Infinite holding time

attribute.name: userDeniedTime
attribute.description: Time to wait before requesting new quota after a request has been denied

attribute.name: noQuotaHandling
attribute.description: Rating group for which quota shall not be requested

class.name: QuotaReporting
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @noFinalReportLimit satisfies (exists(@reportLimitGranted))'><name path='.'/>,noFinalReportLimit: report-limit-granted must be enabled to use no-final-report-limit</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: quotaReportingID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: reportLimitGranted
attribute.description: Reported usage will not exceed granted quota in reports

attribute.name: noFinalReportLimit
attribute.description: Do not limit reported usage in the final report

attribute.name: serviceUnitID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: volume
attribute.description: Default volume when used as service unit

attribute.name: time
attribute.description: Default time when used as service unit

attribute.name: unit
attribute.description: Default units when used as service unit

attribute.name: reAuthorizationTriggersID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: sgsnAddress
attribute.description: Trigger re-authorization if sgsn address has changed for the PDP context

attribute.name: sgsnPlmnId
attribute.description: Trigger re-authorization if PLMN id has changed for the PDP context

attribute.name: ratType
attribute.description: Trigger re-authorization if RAT has changed for the PDP context

attribute.name: qos
attribute.description: Trigger re-authorization if QoS has changed for the PDP context

attribute.name: lac
attribute.description: Trigger re-authorization if LAC has changed for the MS

attribute.name: cellId
attribute.description: Trigger re-authorization if CELL-ID has changed for the MS

class.name: ZeroQuotaTermination
class.description: Behaviour when receiving GSU with any quota type=0 and no FUI

attribute.name: zeroQuotaTerminationID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noActivateDeniedTimer
attribute.description: Don't apply user denied timer after quota termination of the rating group

class.name: QuotaTermination
class.description: Termination behaviour based on result code received at MSCC level

attribute.name: quotaTerminationId
attribute.description: Quota termination name

attribute.name: ongoingReportedPeriod
attribute.description: Handling of ongoing reported resolution period applied for time based charging

attribute.name: finalReport
attribute.description: Final reporting for the rating group

attribute.name: terminationAction
attribute.description: Action taken after quota termination of a rating group

attribute.name: errorResultCodes
attribute.description: List of ranges of result codes

class.name: RatingGroup
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='exists(./Default/@defaultID)'><name path='.'/>: Missing mandatory managed object 'default'</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: ratingGroupID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: notAllowed
attribute.description: Access to rating group not allowed

class.name: Default
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @defaultRatingGroup satisfies (not(exists(@useAccessControlRule)))'><name path='.'/>,defaultRatingGroup: The following attributes can not be combined: default-rating-group, use-access-control-rule</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @useAccessControlRule satisfies (not(exists(@defaultRatingGroup)))'><name path='.'/>,useAccessControlRule: The following attributes can not be combined: default-rating-group, use-access-control-rule</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: defaultID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: defaultRatingGroup
attribute.description: Use this rating group if not found in map table

attribute.name: useAccessControlRule
attribute.description: Use access control rule identifier as rating group

class.name: Map
class.description: Map of access control rules to a rating group

attribute.name: mapId
attribute.description: Rating group identifier

attribute.name: accessControlRule
attribute.description: Access control rule identifier or set of access control rule identifiers mapped to rating group

attribute.name: deferredChargingID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

class.name: TcpSetup
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='exists(/ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/License/@tcpSetupDeferredCharging)'><name path='.'/>: TCP Setup Deferred Charging must be licensed</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @enableServiceDataFlowId satisfies (exists(@default) and @default eq 2)'><name path='.'/>,enableServiceDataFlowId: TCP Setup Deferred Charging must be default disabled for setting enable-service-data-flow-id</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @disableServiceDataFlowId satisfies (exists(@default) and @default eq 1)'><name path='.'/>,disableServiceDataFlowId: TCP Setup Deferred Charging must be default eabled for setting disable-service-data-flow-id</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: tcpSetupID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: default
attribute.description: Specify whether TCP setup deferred charging is disabled or enabled, by default

attribute.name: enableServiceDataFlowId
attribute.description: Enabled service data flow ID or range of service data flow IDs for WSP deferred charging

attribute.name: disableServiceDataFlowId
attribute.description: Disabled service data flow ID or range of service data flow IDs for WSP deferred charging

attribute.name: accessControlGroupId
attribute.description: Access control group identifier for access control group

attribute.name: authorizationCode
attribute.description: Authorization code

attribute.name: localPolicyControlID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

class.name: ActivationTime
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../AllTime))'><name path='.'/>: The following attributes can not be combined: all-time, activation-time</assert> <assert id='set' test='exists(./DefaultRoamingClass/@defaultRoamingClassID)'><name path='.'/>: Missing mandatory managed object 'default-roaming-class'</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: activationTimeId
attribute.description: Activation time (hh:mm)

class.name: RoamingClass
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='exists(./DefaultQualityOfService/@defaultQualityOfServiceID)'><name path='.'/>: Missing mandatory managed object 'default-quality-of-service'</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: roamingClassId
attribute.description: Roaming class identifier

class.name: QualityOfService
class.description: Authorization settings for quality of service

attribute.name: qualityOfServiceId
attribute.description: Authorized traffic class: conversational|streaming|interactive-1|interactive-2|interactive-3|background

class.name: DefaultQualityOfService
class.description: Default authorization settings for quality of service

attribute.name: defaultQualityOfServiceID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

class.name: DefaultRoamingClass
class.description: Default authorization settings to use on no match
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='exists(./DefaultQualityOfService/@defaultQualityOfServiceID)'><name path='.'/>: Missing mandatory managed object 'default-quality-of-service'</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: defaultRoamingClassID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

class.name: AllTime
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../ActivationTime))'><name path='.'/>: The following attributes can not be combined: all-time, activation-time</assert> <assert id='set' test='exists(./DefaultRoamingClass/@defaultRoamingClassID)'><name path='.'/>: Missing mandatory managed object 'default-roaming-class'</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: allTimeID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

class.name: BandwidthControl
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='exists(/ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/License/@serviceAwareBandwidthMgmt)'><name path='.'/>: Service-aware bandwidth management must be licensed</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: bandwidthControlID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

class.name: ThroughputLimitation
class.description: Throughput limitation per context and access control rule

attribute.name: throughputLimitationId
attribute.description: Identifier of the throughput-limitation profile

attribute.name: uplinkLimitation
attribute.description: Uplink throughput limitation per context and access control rule

attribute.name: downlinkLimitation
attribute.description: Downlink throughput limitation per context and access control rule

attribute.name: accessControlRule
attribute.description: Access control rule for which to apply the throughput limitation

class.name: RedirectConstraints
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='exists(/ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/ServiceIdentification/RedirectConstraints)'><name path='.'/>: Constraints must be configured under [managed-element epg pgw service-identification redirect-constraints]</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: redirectConstraintsID
attribute.description: nameSingle instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: oneTime
attribute.description: Enable constraints for one time redirection

attribute.name: initial
attribute.description: Enable constraints for initial redirection

attribute.name: final
attribute.description: Enable constraints for final redirection

class.name: WspSetup
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @enableServiceDataFlowId satisfies (exists(@default) and @default eq 2)'><name path='.'/>,enableServiceDataFlowId: WSP Deferred Charging must be default disabled for setting enable-service-data-flow-id</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @disableServiceDataFlowId satisfies (exists(@default) and @default eq 1)'><name path='.'/>,disableServiceDataFlowId: WSP Deferred Charging must be default eabled for setting disable-service-data-flow-id</assert> <assert id='set' test='exists(/ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/License/@wspSetupDeferredCharging)'><name path='.'/>: WSP Deferred Charging must be licensed</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: wspSetupID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: default
attribute.description: Specify whether WSP connection oriented deferred charging is disabled or enabled, by default

attribute.name: enableServiceDataFlowId
attribute.description: TCP Setup Deferred Charging must be default disabled to enable for specific SDF ID

attribute.name: disableServiceDataFlowId
attribute.description: Disabled Service Data Flow ID or range of Service Data Flow IDs for TCP Setup Deferred Charging

attribute.name: qosControlID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: bearerLevelID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

class.name: Priority
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @defaultBearerQosProfile satisfies ($attr = /ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/QosControl/BearerLevel/DefaultBearerProfile/@defaultBearerProfileId)'><name path='.'/>,defaultBearerQosProfile: Profile must be configured under [managed-element epg pgw qos-control bearer-level default-bearer-profile]</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: priorityId
attribute.description: Priority level

attribute.name: accessControlRule
attribute.description: Access control rule identifier or set of access control rule identifiers

attribute.name: defaultBearerQosProfile
attribute.description: Default bearer QualityOfService profile name
